channel.title: CVE Feed for bPlugins LLC -- Logo Carousel – Clients logo carousel for WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bPlugins LLC -- Logo Carousel – Clients logo carousel for WP

item.title: CVE-2024-47631|2024-10-07T13:20:04.156Z -- bplugins%20llc -- logo%20carousel%20%E2%80%93%20clients%20logo%20carousel%20for%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bPlugins LLC Logo Carousel – Clients logo carousel for WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Logo Carousel – Clients logo carousel for WP: from n/a through 1.2.
